item.title: Worldviews: A Multidisciplinary Report
item.description: Introduction As part of the Worldview Project, the REC commissioned a multidisciplinary academic literature review on the worldview concept. This was prepared by three academics working in different disciplines in different universities. Link You can access the report here: https://www.religiouseducationcouncil.org.uk/news/literaturereview/ And via a direct link here: https://www.religiouseducationcouncil.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/20-19438-REC-Worldview-Report-A4-v2.pdf
